summary: A World War II veteran wants to return to advertising on his own terms, but finds it difficult to be successful and maintain his integrity.
cast: Clark Gable|Deborah Kerr|Sydney Greenstreet|Adolphe Menjou|Ava Gardner|Keenan Wynn|Edward Arnold|Aubrey Mather|Richard Gaines|Frank Albertson|Douglas Fowley|Clinton Sundberg|Gloria Holden|Connie Gilchrist|Kathryn Card|Lillian Bronson|Vera Marshe|Ralph Bunker|Virginia Dale|Jimmy Conlin|Richard Abbott|Charles Abraham|John Albright|Sam Ash|Vangie Beilby|William 'Billy' Benedict|Nan Bennett|Hoffis Better|Frank Bingman|Henry Blair|Harriett Brest|Betty Callender|Harry Cheshire|Edwin Cooper|John Daheim|Bert Davidson|Eugene Baxtor Day|Drew Demorest|Phil Dunham|Madge Erwin|Nellie Farrell|Almeda Fowler|Dink Freeman|Rudy Germane|Mahlon Hamilton|John Hiestand|Fred Howard|Joseph Kearns|Eugene Lay|Frank Leigh|Cathy Lewis|Sydney Logan|Wilbur Mack|Eddie Marr|Vera Martin|John McIntire|David McKim|Sammy McKim|David Merritt|Jerry Miley|Byron Morgan|Anne Nagel|Robert Emmett O'Connor|George O'Hanlon|Charles Peck|Dianne Perrine|Lillian Randolph|Jean Ransome|Jack Rice|Gordon Richards|Joe Sawaya|Erin Selwyn|Violet Seton|Fred Sherman|Ransom M. title: Mercaderes de ilusiones
